heading: WHAT YOU NEED: Sturdy chair. You can do this exercise while waiting for the bus or standing in line at the grocery. For an added challenge, you can modify the exercise to improve your balance.

steps.1: Stand on one foot behind a sturdy chair, holding on for balance.
steps.2: Hold position for up to 10 seconds.
steps.5: Repeat 10-15 more times with each leg.
